name: Pokie Magic Vegas Slots
description:
Description Experience the best of Vegas Slots with Pokie Magic Casino Slots! A stunning selection of hand picked premium slots are yours to play right now.
Start with the majestic Egyptian Dreams, win the Pharaoh Feature Bonus and be stunned by the rewards Cleopatra may offer! Progress to Mystic Palace, Monkey Money 2, the Pandalicious Mystic Panda and more!
Join the fun with
- Best in class slot games with features that are actually fun to play.
- Win awards, and bonus coins, as you progress in all games!
- Doubleup in ALL games - multiply your win by up to 256!
- Graphics which melt in your mouth!

Download now and see why Pokie Magic games really are players favorites.
Current games include
->Egyptian Dreams with the phantastic Pharaoh Pheature!
-> Dolphins Dice with the Treasure Chest Feature and mystery multipliers for every feature spin!
-> Monkey Money 2 with the Wild Monkey Feature!
-> Mystic Panda with the Mystic Bonus Wheel and many feature combinations!
-> Kalahari Sun with the Golden Mask Feature!
-> Mystic Palace - with up to four reelsets in the Double Lucky Gong Feature!
-> Barons Bonanza 2 - big wins to be had!
-> Pyramid Pays 2 - get jiggy with the Pharaoh and win a multiplier up to 8x normal wins!
-> Big Win Gold Mine Slots - our first next generation supergame is yours to play!
-> The all new Barnyard Bucks!


IMPORTANT NOTICE: THIS SOFTWARE PRODUCT IS FOR AMUSEMENT ONLY, INTENDED FOR AGE APPROPRIATE PLAYERS. NO CASH OR OTHER PRIZES WILL BE AWARDED TO ANY PLAYER OF THIS PRODUCT. THE PAYOUTS IN THIS PRODUCT ARE NOT THE SAME AS REAL SLOT MACHINES MAY HAVE. THE CREDITS AND JACKPOT VALUES DISPLAYED ARE STRICTLY SIMULATIONS WITH NO CASH OR PRIZE VALUE. MALFUNCTION VOIDS ALL PAYS AND PLAYS. E & O.E.
THIS SOFTWARE PRODUCT USES OPTIONAL IN-APP PURCHASE TO ACCELERATE PROGRESSION THROUGH GAMEPLAY. SUCH IN-APP PURCHASE IS NOT REQUIRED, BUT CAN GREATLY INCREASE THE SPEED AT WHICH THE PRODUCT FEATURES MAY UNLOCK. AN ACTIVE INTERNET CONNECTION IS ALWAYS REQUIRED TO USE THIS SOFTWARE PRODUCT.
